select t.*, (ihfill+izfill+irfill) ifill,decode(istate,0,'正常','冻结') state,tu.balance,tu.cash,tu.activedate from tb_agent t LEFT JOIN (select ua.ibalance balance,ua.icash cash,u.cactivedate activedate,u.CNICKID from tb_user u, tb_user_acct ua where u.cnickid = ua.cnickid ) tu on tu.CNICKID = t.CNICKID where t.CAGENTID = ?

select ichargeid cid, decode(itype,0,imoney,'') jmoney, decode(itype,1,imoney,'') cmoney,cnickid cuid, cadddate adddate,decode(iopertype,4,'转账',5,'提款',6,'代理商之间转款',7,'销售扣款','交易佣金') otype, cgameid gid,cperiodid pid,decode(iopertype,3,czhid,cprojid) mid, decode(iopertype,3,cdetailid,cbuyid) sid, irate rate from tb_agent_charge where cagentid = ? and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1

select ichargeid,decode(itype,0,imoney,0) imoney, decode(itype,1,imoney,0) omoney,cnickid,ibiztype,cadddate,ioldmoney,ibalance,cmemo from tb_user_charge where cnickid in (select t.cnickid from tb_agent t connect by t.cparentid=prior t.cagentid start with t.cagentid=?) and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
select count(*) num from tb_agent_charge where cagentid = ? and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1

select '汇总：' cid, sum(imoney) jmoney, '' cmoney,'' cuid,'' adddate, '' otype, '' gid,'' pid,'' mid, '' sid,'' rate from tb_agent_charge where cagentid = ? and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1 and itype=0

select '汇总：' ichargeid, (select sum(imoney) from tb_user_charge where itype= 0 and cnickid in (select t.cnickid from tb_agent t connect by t.cparentid=prior t.cagentid start with t.cagentid=?) and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) imoney, (select sum(imoney) from tb_user_charge where itype= 1 and cnickid in (select t.cnickid from tb_agent t connect by t.cparentid=prior t.cagentid start with t.cagentid=?) and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) omoney, '' cmemo,'' cadddate,'' ibiztype, (select sum(ioldmoney) from tb_user_charge where itype= 1 and cnickid in (select t.cnickid from tb_agent t connect by t.cparentid=prior t.cagentid start with t.cagentid=?) and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) ioldmoney, (select sum(ibalance) from tb_user_charge where itype= 1 and cnickid in (select t.cnickid from tb_agent t connect by t.cparentid=prior t.cagentid start with t.cagentid=?) and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) ibalance, '' cnickid from dual

select '汇总：' cid,(select sum(im) from (select iopertype,sum(imoney) im from tb_agent_charge where cagentid = ? and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1 group by iopertype) a where a.iopertype<=3) jmoney, (select sum(im) from (select iopertype,sum(imoney) im from tb_agent_charge where cagentid = ? and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1 group by iopertype) a where a.iopertype>3) cmoney,'' cuid, '' adddate,'' otype, '' gid,'' pid,'' mid,'' sid,'' rate from dual
select cnickid,ibalance from tb_user_acct where ibalance>1
select '' cnickid,sum(ibalance) ibalance from tb_user_acct where ibalance>0

config.sql: select cactivedate from tb_user where cmobileno = ? and cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1

select m.*,(select count(*) from tb_agent_rate where cagentid=(select cagentid from tb_agent where cnickid=m.cnickid)) as fandian from (select a.cparentid,b.cnickid,b.crealname,b.cadddate,b.cactivedate,b.cagentid,b.idaigou,b.ihemai,b.izhuihao,b.ijoin,b.ibalance,a.isdaili daili,b.cidcard,b.ifill,decode(b.ifill,0,'否','是') cfill,b.consumedate from (select u.cmobileno,u.CIDCARD,u.crealname,u.cadddate,u.cactivedate,u.cconsumedate consumedate,u.cagentid,UA.* from tb_user u left join tb_user_acct ua on u.cnickid=ua.cnickid) b left join tb_agent a on a.cnickid=b.cnickid where b.cagentid=? and b.cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1 union all select a.cparentid,a.cnickid,b.crealname,a.ccreatedate,b.cactivedate,a.cagentid,b.idaigou,b.ihemai,b.izhuihao,b.ijoin,b.ibalance,a.isdaili daili,b.cidcard,b.ifill,decode(b.ifill,0,'否','是') cfill,b.consumedate from tb_agent a left join (select u.cmobileno,u.CIDCARD,u.crealname,u.cactivedate,u.cconsumedate consumedate,UA.* from tb_user u left join tb_user_acct ua on u.cnickid=ua.cnickid) b on a.cnickid=b.cnickid where a.cparentid = ? and a.ccreatedate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.ccreatedate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) m where 1=1
select count(t.cnickid) num from tb_user t, tb_user_acct t1 where t.cnickid = t1.cnickid and t.cagentid = ? and t.cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1

select xxx, count(1) num from ( select case when t1.ifill > 1 then 1 else 0 end xxx from tb_user t, tb_user_acct t1 where t.cnickid = t1.cnickid and t.cagentid = ? and t.cadddate >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.cadddate <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) group by xxx
select cgameid gid, nvl((select irate from tb_agent_rate where cagentid = ? and cgameid=t.cgameid),0) irate from tb_game t where istate=1 order by cgameid
update tb_agent set cbankname = ? where cagentid = ?
update tb_agent set crealname = ? where cagentid = ?
update tb_agent set cbankno = ? where cagentid = ?
update tb_agent set cpassword = ? where cagentid = ?
update tb_agent set cparentid = ?, idepth = (select idepth + 1 from tb_agent where cagentid = ?) where cagentid = ? and (select count(1) from tb_agent where cagentid=?) > 0
update tb_agent set cnickid = ? where cagentid = ? and (cnickid = ? or cnickid is null)
update tb_agent set ctelephone = ? where cagentid = ?
